imdb.plot outline: The Beautiful Life chronicles the lives of the zany contestants of the Miss California Pageant. Jessica is a strong, smart, independent wild child who believes that pageants are the root of all evil. This is quite unfortunate since she is forced to compete in the Miss California Pageant. Watch The Beautiful Life and see the craziness that ensues when Jessica and a cast of crazy characters are thrown bosom-deep into the pageant world.
imdb.title: The Beautiful Life
plot: _The Beautiful Life_ (qv) chronicles the lives of the zany contestants of the Miss California Pageant. Jessica is a strong, smart, independent wild child who believes that pageants are the root of all evil. This is quite unfortunate since she is forced to compete in the Miss California Pageant. Watch _The Beautiful Life_ (qv) and see the craziness that ensues when Jessica and a cast of crazy characters are thrown bosom-deep into the pageant world.::Anonymous
